name: Eternal Morning
description:
A new sun rises, raising the horizon from the dark frame of the cosmos, forever pouring warmth from her basket.

❦

Your mind, your body, everything you feel and experience… all of Nature and existence; a mesh of feedback networks within feedback networks.

When one connects a camera to a display, and directs the camera at the display, a seemingly dark screen quickly ignites into a scintillating fire. It requires little more than the most infinitesimal of fluctuations, within that dark frame, to initiate this rainbow blaze.

Gazing into Nature, we see these same processes occur; it is unfolding right now within you, as you read these words; as your cells divide and replicate themselves, as your lungs draw oxygen into your bloodstream, and release dissolved gasses for your to exhale.

It is why anything at all - everything - exists.

In the same way, a microphone connected to an amplified speaker quickly results in a white hot pinpoint of sound saturating the air. Sing into a room at its resonant harmonics and its walls begin to sing with you.

Life is not a bit different from this.

When you become that grain of fluctuation in the dark; very quickly it is dark no longer. 

An eternal morning arises.

Process: A Sony KV-13FM12, Sony HVC-2400, Sony XV-5000, Panasonic WJ-MX50A, Panasonic WJ-MX30 and Videonics MX-1 dreaming of each other, through each other. Direct capture played back through a Sony KV-13FM12 and rescanned via Nikon D7100 donning an Asahi SMC Takumar 1.8/55.
